perturbation.original_text: As of the VNBJ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires.
perturbation.changed_text: As of the VNBJ Closing, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ only if all parties agree in writing, and all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate only upon mutual written consent of all parties. All references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a condition that the JV Agreement ceases to have effect only if all parties agree in writing, directly contradicting the initial statement that the agreement shall immediately cease to have any effect with respect to VNBJ. This creates uncertainty regarding the termination process and requirements, as the original text stipulates immediate cessation upon the VNBJ Closing, while the changed text introduces a conditional cessation dependent on mutual written agreement.This creates an **internal contradiction** with the Article 1.1
perturbation.location: Article 1.Amendment and Termination of JV Agreement a.
perturbation.contradicted_location: Article 1.Amendment and Termination of JV Agreement a.
perturbation.contradicted_text: As of the VNBJ Closing, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ only if all parties agree in writing, and all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate only upon mutual written consent of all parties. All references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires.

perturbation.original_text: Notwithstanding Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall not release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable.
perturbation.changed_text: Notwithstanding Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable, provided such breach is not deemed 'material' by a court of law.
perturbation.explanation: The modification now states that termination *does* release parties from liability for breaches prior to closing, under the condition the court does not deem them 'material'. This creates a contradiction since the original agreement explicitly stated that the termination does not release any parties from liability prior to the closings. Now liability is conditional. This creates an **internal contradiction** within Article 1 regarding liability post-termination.
perturbation.location: Article 1.Amendment and Termination of JV Agreement d.
perturbation.contradicted_location: Article 1.Amendment and Termination of JV Agreement d.
perturbation.contradicted_text: Notwithstanding Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable, provided such breach is not deemed 'material' by a court of law.

perturbation.original_text: This Amendment shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Japan.
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Delaware.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a direct conflict regarding the governing law. The original text explicitly states that the laws of Japan govern the amendment, while the modified text specifies the laws of Delaware. This creates significant ambiguity and potential disputes over which legal system applies to interpret and enforce the agreement. This creates an **internal contradiction** with any clauses referencing Japanese legal standards or procedures.
perturbation.contradicted_text: This Amendment shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Delaware.
